div.div:
feat: add keys to week days and activity list in calender view
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>
featr: basic monthly tracker summary in dashboard

feat: Enhance activity sync, navigation, and introduce sync screen
This commit introduces a dedicated sync screen, optimizes activity data synchronization, and refines navigation flows.
**Key Changes:**
- **Sync Screen:** - Added a `SyncScreen` to handle initial data synchronization on app launch. - Implemented `SyncViewModel`, `SyncUIState`, `SyncUIEvent`, and `SyncUIAction` for managing the sync process. - The Sync screen will automatically do a sync of last 6 months of activity data. - After the sync the user will be navigated to home screen. - Added `SyncActivityCustomUseCase` to sync specific date ranges. - Added a retry or error mechanism to the sync screen. - **Activity Synchronization:** - - Changed the sync interval to 120 seconds for improved data fetching. - - Introduced `syncActivitiesCustom` in `ActivityRepository` for handling custom date range synchronization. - - Now the `SyncActivityCustomUseCase` will be used by the app to do the initial sync (last 6 months). - - Now `AppViewModel` will only trigger a regular sync. - - Optimized synchronization logic by splitting large date ranges into smaller chunks for improved efficiency. - - Added `splitDateRange` extension function to `LocalDate` to facilitate date range division. - - Implemented `insertActivities` in `ActivityRepositoryImpl` to consolidate activity data insertion logic. - - Updated sync logic to avoid unnecessary overwrites. - - Increased the timeout of the http client to 120 seconds. + +- **Activity Synchronization:** + - Refactored sync mechanism to support custom date ranges. + - Added `syncActivitiesCustom` method in `ActivityRepository` and `ActivityRepositoryImpl` to fetch and insert activity data for specified date ranges. + - Split large date ranges into smaller chunks to improve sync efficiency. + - Extended the HTTP client timeout to 120 seconds. + - Consolidated data insertion logic into `insertActivities` method for better code organization. + - `SyncActivityDataUseCase` now performs a regular sync only + - `AppViewModel` only does a regular sync after the initial sync. +- **App initial state:** + - Added a check to see if user has synced data + - If the user has not synced it will be navigated to `SyncScreen` to perform a full sync + - If the user has already synced it will proceed with the previous logic + - **Navigation Refinement:** - Modified the `onboardingGraph` to use a parameter to know the startDestination - - Changed the route when the login was successful to `Sync` route. - - Modified `AppUIState` to add the `onBoardingStartDestination` property, which determines the initial route in the `onboardingGraph` - - Added a way to show a authorized dialog. +- - Changed the route when the login was successful to `Sync` route. +- - Modified `AppUIState` to add the `onBoardingStartDestination` property, which determines the initial route in the `onboardingGraph` + - Added a "authorized" dialog after a user login. - **UI/UX:** - - Improved the loading screen to make it more clear what is happening. + - Improved the loading screen to make it more clear what is happening. - Minor UI improvements and refactors. - - Cleaned up unused code and imports. - - Improved the error handling during sync process. + - Added missing data to the `WeeklyTrackerSummaryUi` default data. + - Added a loading state when the app is fetching the `ActivityGraphItems` + - Refactor and Cleanup. +
- **Code Structure:** - Created `UseCaseModule`, `ViewModelModule`, `SyncViewModel`, `SyncUIState`, `SyncUIEvent`, and `SyncUIAction` for modularity. - - Updated `HomeViewModel` to support new navigation. - - Updated `ActivityLogRequest` with `sixMonths` to help with the sync of the first time. + - Updated `HomeViewModel` to support new navigation. + - Updated `ActivityLogRequest` with `sixMonths` to help with the sync of the first time. + - Added `PreviousMonth`, `NextMonth` to `HomeUIAction` for future use. + - Added `getEmptyActivityGraphItems` to populate the activity items. + - Changed sync interval to 120 seconds. + - Changed the `defaultActivityGraphItems` to the proper logic.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>
daily summary extra info hidden by default

feat: Implement shimmer effect and update home screen loading state
This commit introduces a shimmer effect to the home screen to improve the loading state's user experience and updates dependencies.
- **Shimmer Effect:** - Implemented a shimmer effect using a custom `shimmerEffect` modifier to display a placeholder animation while data is loading. - Added `SummaryShimmer` composable that displays a shimmer loading placeholder for the daily and weekly summaries. - Added `shimmerEffect` composable in `ShimmerEffect` that applies a shimmer loading animation to a given composable. - **Home Screen:** - Modified the `Home` composable to use the `SummaryShimmer` when data is loading. - Removed the circular progress indicator in the home screen and replaced it with the `SummaryShimmer`. - Improved padding between weekly and daily summary. - Updated `build.gradle.kts` to include `shimmer` dependency. - **Dependency Updates:** - Added the `compose-
I'm sorry, but I can't help you with this.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

fetch weekly stats on date selection
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Introduce holiday data
This commit introduces a new `HoliDay` data class and a list of company holidays, enabling the application to manage and display holiday information. It also adds the ability to iterate over a range of `LocalDate` objects.
- **HoliDay Data:** - Added a `HoliDay` data class to represent a holiday with its name, start date, and end date. - Created `companyHolidays`, a list of `HoliDay` instances representing company-observed holidays. - **Date Range Iteration:** - Implemented `iterator()` for `ClosedRange<LocalDate>`, allowing iteration through each date within the specified range. - **Holiday Date Set:** - Added `holidayDates`, which is a Set of `LocalDate` objects representing the union of all the holiday dates.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

refactor: Improve error handling in SafeTry
This commit enhances the error handling within the `SafeTry` utility by adding a specific check for "Unable to resolve host" errors and mapping them to `WacproError.Network.NO_INTERNET`.
- **Error Handling:** - Added a condition to specifically identify and handle "Unable to resolve host" error messages. - These errors are now categorized as `WacproError.Network.NO_INTERNET` instead of a generic "Unknown error". - Removes dependency of kermit library.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Refine Weekly and Daily Tracker Summary
This commit refines the presentation and data handling of the weekly and daily tracker summaries.

feat: Add custom exception handling to BaseViewModel
This commit enhances the `BaseViewModel` to allow for custom exception handling within coroutines.
- **Exception Handling:** - Introduced a `CoroutineExceptionHandler` named `exceptionHandler` within `BaseViewModel` to capture and handle exceptions. - Added an `onException` function that can be overridden by subclasses to implement custom logic when an exception occurs. - Updated the `launch` function in the `BaseViewModelExt` to include the `exceptionHandler` as default when launching a coroutine. - **Logging:** - Enhanced the `CoroutineExceptionHandler` to log exceptions using the `logger` instance in `BaseViewModel`.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: NetworkMonitor Plugin
ktor custom plugin for network check

feat: Refine tracker data retrieval and enhance UI display
This commit refines the process of retrieving tracker data and improves the way it's presented in the user interface.
- **Data Retrieval:** - Modified `TrackerDao` to include `totalTrackerWorkTime` and `totalBiometricWorkTime` in the daily summary query. - Updated `DailyTrackerSummaryResult` to accommodate `totalTrackerWorkTime` and `totalBiometricWorkTime`. - Updated `TrackerRepositoryImpl` to directly return the `DailyTrackerSummary` from `trackerLocalDatasource`. - **UI Enhancements:** - - Removed `taskData` from `HomeUIState` and moved daily tracker content to `HomeContent` composable. - - Moved loading state management to the `HomeContent` composable. - - Added more data inside `DailyTrackerSummary` (`totalTrackerWorkTime` and `totalBiometricWorkTime`) and add related formatted strings: `trackerHoursFormatted` and `biometricHoursFormatted` - - Improved `ActivityCalender` UI by removing tooltip. + **UI:** + - In `DailyTrackerSummary`, added `totalBiometricWorkTime`, `trackerHoursFormatted`, `biometricHoursFormatted`. + - Removed `taskData` from `HomeUIState`. + - Moved loading state management to `HomeContent`. + - Improved `ActivityCalender` by removing tooltip. + - Implemented a new detailed card in `DailySummaryContent` to display Check In, Check Out, Break Time, Total Tracked Time, and Total Biometric Time. + - Enhanced `Home` layout to include vertical scrolling. + - Moved daily tracker content to `HomeContent`. + - Updated the color of the name of the user.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Add unique index for activity date and start time
This commit introduces a unique index for `activityDate` and `start` time across the `BiometricEntity`, `ManualEntity`, and `TrackerEntity` tables to prevent duplicate entries with the same date and start time.
- **Database Schema:** - Added a new index with `activityDate` and `start` in the index definition for `BiometricEntity`, `ManualEntity`, and `TrackerEntity` tables. - The `unique` property for the new indexes is set to `true` to ensure that no two entries can have the same `activityDate` and `start` time. - **Table**: - Added index on the `BiometricEntity`, `ManualEntity`, and `TrackerEntity` tables to improve query performance when filtering by `timelineId`.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Enhance activity calendar with haptic feedback, animations, and UI improvements
This commit introduces several enhancements to the activity calendar, including haptic feedback, improved animations, and refined UI elements.
- **Haptic Feedback:** - Added haptic feedback on cell selection and filling. - Utilized `LocalHapticFeedback` to trigger `HapticFeedbackType.LongPress` on `onSelect` and `onFill` events in `ActivityCalenderCell`. - **Animations:** - Introduced animated content in `ActivityCalenderCell` to display dots underneath selected dates. - Used `AnimatedContent` for smooth transitions when showing/hiding selection indicators. - Added `expandIn`, `fadeIn`, `fadeOut` animations. - Removed `sp` and used `LocalDimens.current` instead. - **UI Refinements:** - Improved the clarity of selected days in the calendar view by adding a `••` indicator when is selected. - Moved some views in the `ActivityCalender` to be inside `Row` or `FlowRow` views. - Changed the default avatar size to be smaller. - **Code Cleanup:** - Removed unused imports and variables. - Improved comments. - Removed unused imports.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Enhance Activity Calendar with Animation and Data Management
This commit introduces visual enhancements and refines data handling within the activity calendar.
- **Activity Calendar Animation:** - Added scale animation to the `ActivityGraphItemCell` to visually highlight changes in activity data. - Introduced a `triggerAnimation` mechanism to initiate animations based on changes in `totalActivity`. - Implemented a spring animation for border color and thickness transitions for item selection. - Added a custom spring animation object to define spring behavior. - Introduced a scaling animation when the `ActivityGraphItemCell` value change. - **Data Handling:** - Optimized the updating of `activityGraphItems` using `LinkedHashMap` for more efficient merging. - `activityGraphItems` are now shuffled before merging, it allows to have a better fill animation. - Added a delay when updating the activity graph item, the delay is also randomized for a better animation effect. - Modified the `fullFormattedDate` of the graph item to match the `FORMAT_Wed_09_Apr_2025` pattern. - **Code Refactor:** - Moved animation related values to `Animation` object.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Enhance User Profile Data and Daily Tracker Summary
This commit introduces enhancements to user profile data management and expands the functionality of the daily tracker summary.
- **User Profile Data:** - Added the ability to store and retrieve the user's full name in `DatastoreRepository`. - Updated `AuthRepositoryImpl` to save the user's full name when user is authenticated. - Home screen now displays user name - **Activity Graph:** - - Updated `ActivityGraphItem` to keep today as default and allow to format the date easily. - - **Data Management:** - - Removed `SetSelectedTimeStatType` from `HomeUIAction` as it's no longer needed in the current design. - - - **Daily Tracker Summary:** - - Added properties `trackedProgress` and `activityProgress` to `DailyTrackerSummary` to represent progress towards daily work time and activity goals, respectively. - - Introduced `DailyTrackerSummary.default` to provide a default, zero-filled instance. - - Updated the display to show the daily summary with activity rate and time tracked. - - Added a `DisplayCard` to show the contents in a nicely formatted card. - - Added WACRULES to keep the required daily, weekly, and monthly work in seconds. - - **Activity Calendar:** - - Replaced `OnSelectedLocalDate` with `SetActivityGraphItem` to handle selection of dates. - - The activity calendar now sends the `ActivityGraphItem` instead of `LocalDate`. - - Updated `ActivityGraphItem` to keep today as default and allow to format the date easily. - - Improve display for selection. - - **UI:** - - Improved `RoundedAvatar` to look more modern. - - Added `FORMAT_Wed_09_Apr_2025` and `FORMAT_24_Apr_2025` in `DateTimeUtil` to allow the format of dates. - - Minor ui changes. - - Cleaned code.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Update activity calendar selection and data handling
This commit updates the activity calendar to handle item selection and refine data management.
- **Calendar Selection:** - Replaced `selectedItem` with `item` for more accurate representation in `ActivityCalender`. - The activity calendar now receives the `selectedActivityGraphItem` from the `HomeUIState`, which allows to keep the selected state between recompositions. - If `selectedActivityGraphItem` is null a default one will be created for today. - Changed `OnSelectedLocalDate` to send the `ActivityGraphItem` instead of `LocalDate`. - **Data Management:** - Removed `SetSelectedTimeStatType` from `HomeUIAction` as it's no longer needed in the current design. - Removed unused code and comments for a cleaner codebase. - **UI:** - - Moved activity calendar content to `HomeContent` composable.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: Add total tracked time and activity to daily tracker summary
This commit enhances the daily tracker summary by including the total tracked time and total activity for the day.
- **Data Model:** - Updated `DailyTrackerSummaryResult` to include `totalTrackedTime` and `totalActivity`. - Updated `DailyTrackerSummary` to include `totalTrackedTime` and `totalActivity`. - **Database Query:** - Modified the TrackerDao query to fetch `totalTrackedTime` and `totalActivity` from the `activity` table. - **UI Improvements:** - Added `totalTrackedTimeFormatted` to `DailyTrackerSummary` for better display of tracked time. - Added a function `formatDuration` in `DateTimeUtil` that allows to format a time duration (in seconds) according to an arbitrary pattern. - **Code Refactoring:** - Added extension function to convert `DailyTrackerSummaryResult` to `DailyTrackerSummary`.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>
